name: ∞ Accessible Design System
description:
A robust, accessible design system starter. Minimal, with only the essentials - as much as we love some of the huge design systems, we found we spent more time deleting and searching than designing, so we created this.


✅ Variant-ready

✅ Autolayout v3


Reasons we think you'll find this handy

===

🚀 Don’t get left behind — Inclusive design is the future so feel confident your design starter is a minimum WCAG 2.1 AA compliant from the get-go. Future you will be thankful!


🏃 Less searching, more designing — Wasting time filtering through unnecessary components? We’ve included the most frequently used, battle-tested components that we use everyday.


❤️ Deliver consistency — we’ve set you with the 8pt grid and a sensible type scale for stronger vertical rhythm and a consistent user experience.


🤯 Reduce decision fatigue — each colour and shadow is labelled for a specific purpose, with accessibility and contrast in mind.


Changelog

Version 1.1

Updated form fields to work a little better.


Hope you find it useful ✌️


💚 Team Caboodle.
